00041 CellAnalysisProcessor::CellAnalysisProcessor() : Processor("CellAnalysisProcessor") 
00042 {
00043   _description = "";
00044   
00045   registerInputCollection(LCIO::CALORIMETERHIT, "InputMuonHcalColName",
00046                           "Name of the muon HCAL collection", 
00047                           _inputMuonHcalColName, std::string("MuonHcalHits"));
00048 
00049   registerInputCollection(LCIO::CALORIMETERHIT, "InputMuonTcmtColName",
00050                           "Name of the muon TCMT collection", 
00051                           _inputMuonTcmtColName, std::string("MuonTcmtHits"));
00052   
00053   // The hit energy spectrum for each cell
00054   registerProcessorParameter("HitEnergyHistoBins", "HistoBins",
00055                              _hitenergyhistobins, int(40));
00056   
00057   registerProcessorParameter("HitEnergyHistoMin", "HistoMin",
00058                              _hitenergyhistomin, float(0.1));
00059   
00060   registerProcessorParameter("HitEnergyHistoMax", "HistoMax",
00061                              _hitenergyhistomax, float(5));
00062   
00063   registerProcessorParameter("RootFileName", "RootFileName", _rootfilename,
00064                              std::string("single-channel-histos.root"));
00065 
00066   registerProcessorParameter("calibrationSpectra", "calibrationSpectra",
00067                              _calibrationSpectra, int(0));
00068   
00069   registerProcessorParameter("UseTCMT", "Use TCMT input hits", _useTCMT,
00070                              bool(false));
00071             
00072   registerProcessorParameter("MappingProcessorName",
00073                              "Name of the MappingProcessor",
00074                              _mappingProcessorName, std::string("HcalMappingProcessor"));
00075  
00076 }

00091 /******************************************************************************/
00092 void CellAnalysisProcessor::openInputCollections(LCEvent* evt) 
00093 {
00094   try {
00095     _hcalInputCol = evt->getCollection(_inputMuonHcalColName);
00096     streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "HCAL collection: " << _inputMuonHcalColName<<", "
00097                  <<_hcalInputCol->getNumberOfElements()<<" elements" << endl;
00098   } 
00099   catch (DataNotAvailableException &e) 
00100     {
00101       streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"Could not open "<<_inputMuonHcalColName<<" collection"<<endl;
00102       throw marlin::SkipEventException(this);
00103     }
00104 
00105   /*-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00106   try {
00107     if (_useTCMT == true) 
00108       {
00109         _tcmtInputCol = evt->getCollection(_inputMuonTcmtColName);
00110         streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "TCMT collection: " << _inputMuonTcmtColName<<", "
00111                      <<_tcmtInputCol->getNumberOfElements()<<" elements" << endl;
00112         
00113       }
00114   } 
00115   catch (DataNotAvailableException &e) 
00116     {
00117       streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"Could not open "<<_inputMuonTcmtColName<<" collection"<<endl;
00118       throw marlin::SkipEventException(this);
00119     }
00120   
00121 }

00123 /******************************************************************************/

00127 /******************************************************************************/
00128 void CellAnalysisProcessor::init() 
00129 {
00130   printParameters();
00131   
00132   std::stringstream message;
00133   bool error = false;
00134 
00135   _ahcMapper = dynamic_cast<const AhcMapper*> (MappingProcessor::getMapper(_mappingProcessorName));
00136   if (!_ahcMapper)
00137     {
00138       message << "MappingProcessor::getMapper(" << _mappingProcessorName
00139               << ") did not return a valid mapper." << std::endl;
00140       error = true;      
00141     }
00142   if (error) 
00143     {
00144       streamlog_out(ERROR) << message.str();
00145       throw marlin::StopProcessingException(this);
00146     }
00147 
00148   /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00149   _rootout = new TFile(_rootfilename.c_str(), "RECREATE");
00150 
00151 //   _tree = new TTree(_treeName.c_str(), _treeName.c_str());
00152 //   _tree->Branch("hcalEsum", &_hcalEsum, "hcalEsum/F");
00153 //   _tree->Branch("hcalHitEnergy", &_hcalHitEnergy, "hcalHitEnergy/F");
00154 //   _tree->Branch("hcalNHits", &_hcalHitEnergy, "hcalHitEnergy/F");
00155   
00156 
00157   if (_useTCMT) 
00158     {
00159       TDirectory* tcmtDir = _rootout->mkdir("TCMT");
00160 
00161       // Create the hit energy spectrum histograms for ech tcmt strip
00162       for (unsigned int layer = 0; layer != MAXTCMTLAYERS; ++layer) 
00163         {       
00164           tcmtDir->cd();
00165           std::ostringstream directory_name_stream;
00166           directory_name_stream << "layer " << layer + 1;
00167           std::string directory_name = directory_name_stream.str();
00168           tcmtDir->mkdir(directory_name.c_str())->cd();
00169 
00170 
00171           std::ostringstream histoLayerNameStream;
00172           histoLayerNameStream << "tcmtlayer: " << std::setw(2)
00173                                << std::setfill('0') << layer + 1;
00174           
00175           std::string histoLayerName = histoLayerNameStream.str();
00176           _tcmtlayerenergyhistos[layer] = new TH1F(histoLayerName.c_str(),
00177                                                    histoLayerName.c_str(), _hitenergyhistobins,
00178                                                    _hitenergyhistomin, _hitenergyhistomax);
00179           
00180           for (unsigned int strip = 0; strip != MAXTCMTSTRIPS; ++strip) 
00181             {
00182               std::ostringstream histoNameStream;
00183               histoNameStream << "tcmtlayer: " << std::setw(2)
00184                               << std::setfill('0') << layer + 1 << " strip: "
00185                               << std::setw(2) << std::setfill('0') << strip;
00186               
00187               std::string histoName = histoNameStream.str();
00188               _tcmtenergyhistos[layer][strip] = new TH1F(histoName.c_str(),
00189                                                          histoName.c_str(), _hitenergyhistobins,
00190                                                          _hitenergyhistomin, _hitenergyhistomax);
00191             }
00192         }
00193     }
00194   
00195   _rootout->cd();
00196   TDirectory* ahcalDir = _rootout->mkdir("AHCAL");
00197   _hMuonHcalESum = new TH1F("hMuonHcalESum", "hMuonHcalESum", 5000, 0, 200);
00198 
00199   // Create the hit energy spectrum histogram for each cell
00200   for (unsigned int module = 0; module != MAXNRMODULES; ++module) 
00201     {
00202       ahcalDir->cd();
00203       std::ostringstream directory_name_stream;
00204       directory_name_stream << "module " << module + 1;
00205       std::string directory_name = directory_name_stream.str();
00206       ahcalDir->mkdir(directory_name.c_str())->cd();
00207 
00208 
00209       std::ostringstream histo_nameMod_stream;
00210       histo_nameMod_stream << "module: " << std::setw(2) << std::setfill('0')
00211                            << module + 1;
00212       
00213       std::string histo_nameMod = histo_nameMod_stream.str();
00214       
00215       _hitenergyPerModulehistos[module] = new TH1F(histo_nameMod.c_str(),
00216                                                    histo_nameMod.c_str(), _hitenergyhistobins, _hitenergyhistomin,
00217                                                    _hitenergyhistomax);
00218       
00219       for (unsigned int chip = 0; chip != MAXNRCHIPS; ++chip) 
00220         {
00221           for (unsigned int channel = 0; channel != MAXNRCHANNELS; ++channel) {
00222             std::ostringstream histo_name_stream;
00223             
00224             histo_name_stream << "module: " << std::setw(2)
00225                               << std::setfill('0') << module + 1 << " chip: "
00226                               << std::setw(2) << std::setfill('0') << chip
00227                               << " channel: " << std::setw(2) << std::setfill('0')
00228                               << channel;
00229             
00230             std::string histo_name = histo_name_stream.str();
00231             
00232             streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << "Creating histogram: " << histo_name
00233                                   << std::endl;
00234             
00235             _hitenergyhistos[module][chip][channel] = new TH1F(histo_name.c_str(), histo_name.c_str(),
00236                                                                _hitenergyhistobins, _hitenergyhistomin,
00237                                                                _hitenergyhistomax);
00238             
00239           } // end of loop over channel
00240         } // end of loop over chip
00241     }// end of loop over module
00242   
00243   
00244 
00245 }

00247 /******************************************************************************/
00248 /*                                                                            */
00249 /*                                                                            */
00250 /*                                                                            */
00251 /******************************************************************************/
00252 void CellAnalysisProcessor::processEvent(LCEvent* evt) 
00253 {
00254   openInputCollections(evt);
00255 
00256   /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00257    TCMT*/
00258   
00259   
00260   CellIDDecoder<CalorimeterHit>* tcmtDecoder = 0;
00261   if (_useTCMT) 
00262     {
00263       LCTypedVector<CalorimeterHit> tcmtHitsVec(_tcmtInputCol);  
00264       streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << "TCMT hits " << tcmtHitsVec.size() << endl;
00265 
00266       tcmtDecoder = new CellIDDecoder<CalorimeterHit> (_tcmtInputCol);
00267 
00268       for (unsigned int i = 0; i < tcmtHitsVec.size(); i++) 
00269         {
00270           CalorimeterHit *Hit = tcmtHitsVec[i];
00271           const int I = (*tcmtDecoder)(Hit)["I"];
00272           const int J = (*tcmtDecoder)(Hit)["J"];
00273           const int K = (*tcmtDecoder)(Hit)["K-1"];
00274           const int layer = K;
00275           int strip = 0;
00276           if (I != 0)
00277             strip = I - 1;
00278           if (J != 0)
00279             strip = J - 1;
00280           streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << "Found a TCMT hit. Layer: " << layer << ", "
00281                         << " Strip: " << strip << endl;
00282           
00283           float energy = Hit->getEnergy();
00284           _tcmtlayerenergyhistos[layer-1]->Fill(energy);
00285           _tcmtenergyhistos[layer-1][strip]->Fill(energy);
00286           
00287         }/*end loop over i*/      
00288     }
00289   
00290   
00291   /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00292    HCAL*/
00293   LCCollection *relCol = evt->getCollection("AhcHitAmplitudeRelation");
00294   if (relCol == NULL) 
00295     {
00296       cout << " no relation collection, aborting" << endl;
00297       exit(1);
00298     }
00299   UTIL::LCRelationNavigator navigator(relCol);
00300 
00301   /*Angela Lucaci: I know, bad idea to hard-code the collection name.
00302     But I dislike more the idea of adding yet another steering parameter,
00303     so I keep it like this for the moment.*/
00304   LCCollection *allHcalHitsCol = evt->getCollection("AhcCalorimeter_Hits");
00305 
00306   LCTypedVector<CalorimeterHit> ahcalHitsVec(_hcalInputCol);  
00307   streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << "AHCAL hits " << ahcalHitsVec.size() << endl;
00308 
00309   unsigned int numHcalHits = ahcalHitsVec.size();
00310 
00311 //   float esum = 0;
00312 
00313 //   /*---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00314 //   unsigned int numHcalHits = ahcalHitsVec.size();
00315 //   int maxHcalLayerNumber = 0;
00316   
00317 //   float numHitsPerLayer[MAXNRMODULES] = {0};
00318 //   float energyPerLayer [MAXNRMODULES] = {0};
00319 //   CellIDDecoder<CalorimeterHit>* decoder = new CellIDDecoder<CalorimeterHit> (_hcalInputCol);
00320 //   unsigned int countCentralTiles = 0;
00321 
00322 //   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < numHcalHits; i++) 
00323 //     {
00324 //       CalorimeterHit *Hit = ahcalHitsVec[i];
00325 //       const int K = (*decoder)(Hit)["K-1"] + 1;
00326 //       if (maxHcalLayerNumber < K)
00327 //      maxHcalLayerNumber = K;
00328 //       numHitsPerLayer[K-1]++;
00329 //       energyPerLayer[K-1] += Hit->getEnergy();
00330 
00331 //       const int I = (*decoder)(Hit)["I"];
00332 //       const int J = (*decoder)(Hit)["J"];
00333       
00334 //       bool isCentralTile = ( (I==40 || I==43 || I==46 || I==49) && (J==40 || J==43 || J==46 || J==49));
00335 //       if (_useCentralTilesOnly == true && isCentralTile == true) countCentralTiles++;
00336 
00337 //       //cout<<"     lntai I/J/K="<<I<<"/"<<J<<"/"<<K<<endl;  
00338 //     }
00339 
00340 //   if (_useCentralTilesOnly == true && countCentralTiles != numHcalHits)
00341 //     {
00342 //       streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<" non-central tiles, skip event"<<endl;
00343 //       throw marlin::SkipEventException(this);
00344 //     }
00345 
00346 //   float median = TMath::Median(MAXNRMODULES, energyPerLayer);
00347 //   bool isPunchThoughPion = false;
00348 //   bool hasTooManyHitsPerLayer = false;
00349 //   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < MAXNRMODULES; ++i)
00350 //     {
00351 //       if (energyPerLayer[i] > 3*median) isPunchThoughPion = true;
00352 //       if (numHitsPerLayer[i] > _maxNumberOfHitsPerHcalLayer)
00353 //      {
00354 //        hasTooManyHitsPerLayer = true;
00355 //        break;
00356 //      }
00357 //     }
00358 
00359 //   streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"\n Event "<<evt->getEventNumber()<<" numHcalHits: "<<numHcalHits
00360 //       <<" minNumberOfHitsInHcal: "<<_minNumberOfHitsInHcal
00361 //       <<" maxHcalLayerNumber: "<<maxHcalLayerNumber
00362 //       <<" minHcalLayerNumber: "<<_minHcalLayerNumber<<endl;
00363 
00364 //   if (!(numHcalHits >= (unsigned)_minNumberOfHitsInHcal && maxHcalLayerNumber>=_minHcalLayerNumber 
00365 //      && (hasTooManyHitsPerLayer==false)
00366 //      && (isPunchThoughPion==false) 
00367 //      ))
00368 //     {
00369 //       streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"Probably a pion, skipping"<<endl;
00370 //       //return;
00371 //       throw marlin::SkipEventException(this);
00372 //     }
00373 
00374 
00375   /*---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00376   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < numHcalHits; i++) 
00377     {
00378       CalorimeterHit *Hit = ahcalHitsVec[i];
00379       const int cellID = Hit->getCellID0();
00380       const unsigned int module  = _ahcMapper->getModuleFromCellID(cellID);
00381       const unsigned int chip    = _ahcMapper->getChipFromCellID(cellID);
00382       const unsigned int channel = _ahcMapper->getChanFromCellID(cellID);
00383       
00384       if (module == 0) continue;
00385       
00386       const float energy = Hit->getEnergy();
00387       
00388       float amplRawPedSubst  = 0.;
00389       float energyNoTNoSat   = 0.;
00390       float energyWithTNoSat = 0.;
00391 
00392       CalorimeterHit *originalHcalHit = NULL;
00393 
00394       for (int iAll = 0; iAll < allHcalHitsCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++iAll)
00395         {
00396           CalorimeterHit *originalHit = dynamic_cast<CalorimeterHit*>(allHcalHitsCol->getElementAt(iAll));
00397           if (originalHit->getCellID0() == cellID) 
00398             {
00399               originalHcalHit = originalHit;
00400               break;
00401             }
00402         }/*end loop over iAll*/
00403 
00404       if (originalHcalHit == NULL)
00405         {
00406           cout<<"\n Sorry, something is wrong, no original HCAL hit found"<<endl;
00407           exit(1);
00408         }
00409 
00410       const LCObjectVec &amplVec = navigator.getRelatedToObjects(originalHcalHit);
00411       //streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"  amplVec.size="<<amplVec.size()<<endl;
00412       if (amplVec.size() > 0) 
00413         {
00414           LCGenericObject *obj  = dynamic_cast<LCGenericObject*> (amplVec[0]);
00415           AhcAmplitude *ahcAmpl = new AhcAmplitude(obj);
00416           amplRawPedSubst = ahcAmpl->getAmplRawMinusPedestalADC();
00417           energyNoTNoSat = ahcAmpl->getAmplNOTTemperatureCorrMIP();
00418           energyWithTNoSat = ahcAmpl->getAmplTemperatureCorrMIP();
00419           delete ahcAmpl;
00420         }
00421       
00422       // without temperature correction       
00423       streamlog_out(DEBUG1) << "Filling histogram: "
00424                             << "module: " << std::setw(2) << std::setfill('0')
00425                             << module << " chip: " << std::setw(2)
00426                             << std::setfill('0') << chip << " channel: "
00427                             << std::setw(2) << std::setfill('0') << channel
00428                             << std::endl;
00429 
00430      
00431       //cout << "amplitude adc - pedestal: " << amplRawPedSubst << endl;
00432       
00433       
00434       if (_calibrationSpectra == 3) 
00435         {
00436           _hitenergyhistos[module - 1][chip][channel]->Fill(energyWithTNoSat);
00437           _hitenergyPerModulehistos[module - 1]->Fill(energyWithTNoSat);
00438 //        esum += energyWithTNoSat;
00439           //cout << energyNoTNoSat << " mod/chip/chan " << module-1 << " / " << chip << " / " << channel << endl;
00440         }
00441       
00442       else if (_calibrationSpectra == 2) 
00443         {
00444           _hitenergyhistos[module - 1][chip][channel]->Fill(energyNoTNoSat);
00445           _hitenergyPerModulehistos[module - 1]->Fill(energyNoTNoSat);
00446 //        esum += energyNoTNoSat;
00447           //cout << energyNoTNoSat << " mod/chip/chan " << module-1 << " / " << chip << " / " << channel << endl;
00448         }
00449       
00450       // store calibration spectra in MIP units
00451       else if (_calibrationSpectra == 0) 
00452         {
00453           _hitenergyhistos[module - 1][chip][channel]->Fill(energy);
00454           _hitenergyPerModulehistos[module - 1]->Fill(energy);
00455 //        esum += energy;
00456           //cout << energy << endl;
00457         }
00458       // store calibration spectra in ADC units
00459       else if (_calibrationSpectra == 1) 
00460         {
00461           _hitenergyhistos[module - 1][chip][channel]->Fill(amplRawPedSubst);
00462           _hitenergyPerModulehistos[module - 1]->Fill(amplRawPedSubst);
00463 //        esum += amplRawPedSubst;
00464         }
00465     }/*end loop over input HCAL calorimeter hits
00466        ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00467   
00468 //   streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"esum: "<<esum<<endl;
00469 
00470 //   _hMuonHcalESum->Fill(esum);
00471 
00472 //   _hcalEsum = esum;
00473 //   _tree->Fill();
00474 
00475 
00476   /* make sure the tree is saved once in a while*/
00477   if (evt->getEventNumber()%1000 == 0) 
00478     {
00479 //       _tree->Write("", TObject::kOverwrite);
00480       _rootout->Write("", TObject::kOverwrite);
00481     }
00482 }

00484 /******************************************************************************/
00485 /*                                                                            */
00486 /*                                                                            */
00487 /*                                                                            */
00488 /******************************************************************************/
00489 void CellAnalysisProcessor::end() 
00490 {
00491 //   _tree->Write("", TObject::kOverwrite);
00492   _rootout->Write("", TObject::kOverwrite);
00493   _rootout->Close();
00494 
00495 }
00496 
00497 /******************************************************************************/
00498 /*                                                                            */
00499 /*                                                                            */
00500 /*                                                                            */
00501 /******************************************************************************/
00502 void CellAnalysisProcessor::writeHistograms() {
00503   if (_useTCMT) 
00504     {
00505       for (unsigned int layer = 0; layer != MAXTCMTLAYERS; ++layer) 
00506         {
00507           _tcmtlayerenergyhistos[layer]->Write("", TObject::kOverwrite);
00508 
00509           for (unsigned int strip = 0; strip != MAXTCMTSTRIPS; ++strip) 
00510             {
00511               _tcmtenergyhistos[layer][strip]->Write("", TObject::kOverwrite);
00512             }
00513         }
00514     }
00515   
00516   for (unsigned int module = 0; module != MAXNRMODULES; ++module) 
00517     {
00518      _hitenergyPerModulehistos[module]->Write("", TObject::kOverwrite);
00519 
00520       for (unsigned int chip = 0; chip != MAXNRCHIPS; ++chip) 
00521         {
00522           for (unsigned int channel = 0; channel != MAXNRCHANNELS; ++channel) 
00523             {
00524               streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << "Writing histogram for " << "module: "
00525                                     << std::setw(2) << std::setfill('0') << module + 1
00526                                     << " chip: " << std::setw(2) << std::setfill('0')
00527                                     << chip << " channel: " << std::setw(2)
00528                                     << std::setfill('0') << channel << std::endl;
00529               
00530               _hitenergyhistos[module][chip][channel]->Write("", TObject::kOverwrite);
00531               
00532             }
00533         }
00534     }
00535 }
